@McallRich Please provide more detail about your requirement to useful investigate and suggest you later.
@d_omame you can bring your coin case and mobile phone on board as it is not included in carry-on baggage.

@d_omame Yes,We would like to inform that Nok Lite ticket is not included free baggage allowance and only one (1) piece of baggage is allowed to be carried on board provided; that it does not exceed the dimensions of 56cm X 36cm X 23cm and provided that it does not weigh more than 7 kg

data.text: @EmmaInBangkok In this case, please bring a police report and also the photo copy of passport for the consideration at the airport.

@EmmaInBangkok You will be checked the document by the Air of Thailand staff. If you cannot bring the actual passport, you may be rejected to fly. May I know the reason why you are unable to use passport, please?
@EmmaInBangkok You can only use passport to check in. I apologize for the inconvenience.
@PatrickCagoul We will have new schedules available for booking on our website again in September 2018. We apologize for this inconvenience.

Don’t miss a chance to see the Candle Festival, a once-a-year festival in Ubon Ratchathani. Get impressed by the ornately carved beeswax candles, shows, and wax sculpture exhibition that occurs around the city. Book your trip now at https://t.co/zSniApoJwj #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/gyhVHHUnzN
@cmuggla @NokAirlines please can we have your booking no. and we will contact you back? Sorry for the inconvenience.
@scottycyder We suggest you make two reservations which are 2 nok extra tickets and 2 nok lite tickets.
@alanclarke1878 Please provide more detail about your requirement to useful investigate and suggest you later.
@scotshyy You can request to be dropped off at your place of stay or for Phuket town at Central Festival Phuket Shopping Plaza and Limelight Avenue Phuket shopping center.
@scotshyy Thank you. We are happy to hear and to look forward to welcoming you onboard again in future.
